description: It has a weird interface. No window decoration, no menu. Can't close the window (I used Alt+F4 to quit). Text is too small to read, and no option to change the font size. Looks like someone was testing creating an app and abandoned before completing it. Why is it even released to the public?
It Works. Just need to include more languages. Include hebrew.
Some words have imcorrect meanings and more words are needed to be added.
